body_html:
This is expected because we do not guarantee stable reductions. It makes sense to optimize GPU code differently from CPU code, resulting in edge cases like this.

We should add some extra docs explaining this though (maybe a CUDA gotchas section).

body:
This is expected because we do not guarantee stable reductions. It makes sense to optimize GPU code differently from CPU code, resulting in edge cases like this.

We should add some extra docs explaining this though (maybe a CUDA gotchas section).
